item.description:
The Human Revolution, Incus, Sarah Jezebel Wood and Denise Santoro Concert
The Human Revolution Acoustic rock the Heartbeat Collective Barn!
Host: The Heartbeat Collective
Type: Music/Arts - Concert
Date: Sunday, May 24, 2009
Time: 8:30pm - 11:55pm
Location: Heartbeat Collective Barn, RSVP* for details
City/Town: Jamaica Plain, MA
*RSVP: Email: Jason@heARTbeatCollective.org

Description: Come join us and our dear friends from Costa Rica and California playing their uplifting and inspiring music, with a stripped down set by Incus, and with our beloved sister Sarah Jezebel Wood (Solstice Dance)returning to Boston to grace us with her dancing, and our local hero Denise Santoro (Vadalna Tribal Dance Co.) getting down as well.

Please email Jason@heARTbeatCollective.org to reserve a seat, limiting seating.

Suggested sliding scale donation: $5-10
Doors Open: 8:15pm,
Showtime: 8:30

Monday is Memorial Day btw.

Hope to see you there.

www.thehumanrevolution.org
item.name: The Human Revolution (of Raw Spirit Fest) at The Heartbeat Collective
